selfTest.cpp

16#include "Context.h"
17#include <set>
18
19using namespace helios;
20
21int Context::selfTest(){
22
23 std::cout << "Running Context self-test..." << std::flush;
24
25 Context context_test;
26
27 uint error_count=0;
28
29 double errtol = 1e-7;
30
31 std::string answer;
32
33 //------- Add Patch --------//
34
35 vec3 center,center_r;
36 vec2 size, size_r;
37 std::vector<vec3> vertices, vertices_r;
38 SphericalCoord rotation, rotation_r;
39 vec3 normal, normal_r;
40 RGBcolor color, color_r;
41 uint UUID;
42 std::vector<uint> UUIDs;
43 PrimitiveType type;
44 float area_r;
45 Primitive* prim;
46 uint objID;
47
48 //uint addPatch( const vec3& center, const vec2& size );
49 center = make_vec3(1,2,3);
50 size = make_vec2(1,2);
51 vertices.resize(4);
52 vertices.at(0) = center + make_vec3( -0.5f*size.x, -0.5f*size.y, 0.f);
53 vertices.at(1) = center + make_vec3( 0.5f*size.x, -0.5f*size.y, 0.f);
54 vertices.at(2) = center + make_vec3( 0.5f*size.x, 0.5f*size.y, 0.f);
55 vertices.at(3) = center + make_vec3( -0.5f*size.x, 0.5f*size.y, 0.f);
56 UUID = context_test.addPatch(center,size);
57 type = context_test.getPrimitiveType(UUID);
58 center_r = context_test.getPatchCenter(UUID);
59 size_r = context_test.getPatchSize(UUID);
60 normal_r = context_test.getPrimitiveNormal(UUID);
61 vertices_r = context_test.getPrimitiveVertices(UUID);
62 area_r = context_test.getPrimitiveArea(UUID);
63 color_r = context_test.getPrimitiveColor(UUID);
64
65 if( type!=PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH ){
66 error_count++;
67 std::cerr << "failed: uint addPatch( const vec3& center, const vec2& size ). Patch::getType did not return `PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH'." << std::endl;
68 }
69 if( center_r.x!=center.x || center_r.y!=center.y || center_r.z!=center.z ){
70 std::cerr << "failed: uint addPatch( const vec3& center, const vec2& size ). Patch::getCenter returned incorrect value." << std::endl;
71 }
72 if( size_r.x!=size.x || size_r.y!=size.y ){
73 error_count++;
74 std::cerr << "failed: uint addPatch( const vec3& center, const vec2& size ). Patch::getSize returned incorrect value." << std::endl;
75 }
76 if( normal_r.x!=0.f || normal_r.y!=0.f || normal_r.z!=1.f ){
77 error_count++;
78 std::cerr << "failed: uint addPatch( const vec3& center, const vec2& size ). Patch::getNormal did not return correct value." << std::endl;
79 }
80 if( vertices.at(0).x!=vertices_r.at(0).x || vertices.at(0).y!=vertices_r.at(0).y || vertices.at(0).z!=vertices_r.at(0).z ||
81 vertices.at(1).x!=vertices_r.at(1).x || vertices.at(1).y!=vertices_r.at(1).y || vertices.at(1).z!=vertices_r.at(1).z ||
82 vertices.at(2).x!=vertices_r.at(2).x || vertices.at(2).y!=vertices_r.at(2).y || vertices.at(2).z!=vertices_r.at(2).z ||
83 vertices.at(3).x!=vertices_r.at(3).x || vertices.at(3).y!=vertices_r.at(3).y || vertices.at(3).z!=vertices_r.at(3).z ){
84 error_count++;
85 std::cerr << "failed: uint addPatch( const vec3& center, const vec2& size ). Patch::getVertices did not return correct value." << std::endl;
86 }
87 if( std::abs( area_r - size.x*size.y )>1e-5 ){
88 error_count++;
89 std::cerr << "failed: uint addPatch( const vec3& center, const vec2& size ). Patch::getArea did not return correct value." << std::endl;
90 }
91 if( color_r.r!=0.f || color_r.g!=0.f || color_r.b!=0.f ){
92 error_count++;
93 std::cerr << "failed: uint addPatch( const vec3& center, const vec2& size ). Patch::getColor did not return default color of black." << std::endl;
94 }
95
96 if( !context_test.getPrimitiveTextureFile(UUID).empty() ){
97 error_count++;
98 std::cerr << "failed: Patch without texture mapping returned true for texture map test." << std::endl;
99 }
100
101 //------- Copy Patch --------//
102
103 std::vector<float> cpdata{5.2f,2.5f,3.1f};
104
105 context_test.setPrimitiveData( UUID, "somedata", HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT, cpdata.size(), &cpdata[0] );
106
107 uint UUID_cpy = context_test.copyPrimitive(UUID);
108
109 vec3 center_cpy = context_test.getPatchCenter(UUID_cpy);
110 vec2 size_cpy = context_test.getPatchSize(UUID_cpy);
111
112 if( UUID_cpy != 1 ){
113 error_count++;
114 std::cerr << "failed: copyPrimitive. Copied patch does not have the correct UUID." << std::endl;
115 }
116 if( center_cpy.x!=center.x || center_cpy.y!=center.y || center_cpy.z!=center.z ){
117 error_count++;
118 std::cerr << "failed: copyPrimitive. Copied patch did not return correct center coordinates." << std::endl;
119 }
120 if( size_cpy.x!=size.x || size_cpy.y!=size.y ){
121 error_count++;
122 std::cerr << "failed: copyPrimitive. Copied patch did not return correct size." << std::endl;
123 }
124
125 std::vector<float> cpdata_copy;
126 context_test.getPrimitiveData( UUID_cpy, "somedata", cpdata_copy );
127
128 if( cpdata.size() != cpdata_copy.size() ){
129 error_count++;
130 std::cerr << "failed: copyPrimitive. Copied patch primitive data does not have correct size." << std::endl;
131 }
132 for( uint i=0; i<cpdata.size(); i++ ){
133 if( cpdata.at(i) != cpdata_copy.at(i) ){
134 error_count++;
135 std::cerr << "failed: copyPrimitive. Copied patch primitive data does not match." << std::endl;
136 }
137 break;
138 }
139
140 //translate the copied patch
141 vec3 shift = make_vec3(5.f,4.f,3.f);
142 context_test.translatePrimitive(UUID_cpy,shift);
143 center_cpy = context_test.getPatchCenter(UUID_cpy);
144 center_r = context_test.getPatchCenter(UUID);
145
146 if( std::abs(center_cpy.x-center.x-shift.x)>errtol || std::abs(center_cpy.y-center.y-shift.y)>errtol || std::abs(center_cpy.z-center.z-shift.z)>errtol || center_r.x!=center.x || center_r.y!=center.y || center_r.z!=center.z ){
147 error_count++;
148 std::cerr << "failed: copyPrimitive. Copied patch could not be properly translated." << std::endl;
149 }
150
151 //------- Delete Patch --------//
152
153 context_test.deletePrimitive(UUID);
154
155 if(context_test.getPrimitiveCount() != 1 ){
156 error_count++;
157 std::cerr << "failed: deletePrimitive. Patch not properly deleted based on primitive count." << std::endl;
158 }
159 if( context_test.doesPrimitiveExist(UUID) ){
160 error_count++;
161 std::cerr << "failed: deletePrimitive. Patch not properly deleted." << std::endl;
162 }
163
164 UUID = UUID_cpy;
165
166 //------- Add a Rotated Patch --------//
167
168 center = make_vec3(1,2,3);
169 size = make_vec2(1,2);
170 rotation = make_SphericalCoord(1.f, 0.15f*M_PI, 0.5f*M_PI);
171 rotation.azimuth = 0.5f*M_PI;;
172 UUID = context_test.addPatch(center,size,rotation);
173 normal_r = context_test.getPrimitiveNormal(UUID);
174
175 rotation_r = make_SphericalCoord( 0.5f*float(M_PI)-asinf( normal_r.z ), atan2f(normal_r.x,normal_r.y) );
176
177 context_test.deletePrimitive(UUID);
178
179 if( std::abs(rotation_r.elevation-rotation.elevation)>errtol || std::abs(rotation_r.azimuth-rotation.azimuth)>errtol ){
180 error_count++;
181 std::cerr << "failed: Rotated patch did not return correct normal vector." << std::endl;
182 }
183
184 //------- Add Triangle --------//
185
186 vec3 v0,v0_r;
187 vec3 v1,v1_r;
188 vec3 v2,v2_r;
189
190 //uint addTriangle( const vec3& v0, const vec3& v1, const vec3& v2, const RGBcolor &color );
191 v0 = make_vec3(1,2,3);
192 v1 = make_vec3(2,4,6);
193 v2 = make_vec3(3,6,5);
194 vertices.at(0) = v0;
195 vertices.at(1) = v1;
196 vertices.at(2) = v2;
197 color = RGB::red;
198 UUID = context_test.addTriangle(v0,v1,v2,color);
199
200 type = context_test.getPrimitiveType(UUID);
201 normal_r = context_test.getPrimitiveNormal(UUID);
202 vertices_r = context_test.getPrimitiveVertices(UUID);
203 area_r = context_test.getPrimitiveArea(UUID);
204 color_r = context_test.getPrimitiveColor(UUID);
205
206 if( type!=PRIMITIVE_TYPE_TRIANGLE ){
207 error_count++;
208 std::cerr << "failed: uint addTriangle(const vec3& v0, const vec3& v1, const vec3& v2, const RGBcolor &color ). Triangle::getType did not return `PRIMITIVE_TYPE_TRIANGLE'." << std::endl;
209 }
210 normal = cross( v1-v0, v2-v1 );
211 normal.normalize();
212 if( normal_r.x!=normal.x || normal_r.y!=normal.y || normal_r.z!=normal.z ){
213 error_count++;
214 std::cerr << "failed: uint addTriangle(const vec3& v0, const vec3& v1, const vec3& v2, const RGBcolor &color ). Triangle::getNormal did not return correct value." << std::endl;
215 }
216 if( vertices.at(0).x!=vertices_r.at(0).x || vertices.at(0).y!=vertices_r.at(0).y || vertices.at(0).z!=vertices_r.at(0).z ||
217 vertices.at(1).x!=vertices_r.at(1).x || vertices.at(1).y!=vertices_r.at(1).y || vertices.at(1).z!=vertices_r.at(1).z ||
218 vertices.at(2).x!=vertices_r.at(2).x || vertices.at(2).y!=vertices_r.at(2).y || vertices.at(2).z!=vertices_r.at(2).z ){
219 error_count++;
220 std::cerr << "failed: uint addTriangle(const vec3& v0, const vec3& v1, const vec3& v2, const RGBcolor &color ). Triangle::getVertices did not return correct value." << std::endl;
221 }
222 vec3 A(v1-v0);
223 vec3 B(v2-v0);
224 vec3 C(v2-v1);
225 float a = A.magnitude();
226 float b = B.magnitude();
227 float c = C.magnitude();
228 float s = 0.5f*( a+b+c );
229 if( area_r!=sqrtf(s*(s-a)*(s-b)*(s-c)) ){
230 error_count++;
231 std::cerr << "failed: uint addTriangle(const vec3& v0, const vec3& v1, const vec3& v2, const RGBcolor &color ). Triangle::getArea did not return correct value." << std::endl;
232 }
233 if( color_r.r!=color.r || color_r.g!=color.g || color_r.b!=color.b ){
234 error_count++;
235 std::cerr << "failed: uint addTriangle(const vec3& v0, const vec3& v1, const vec3& v2, const RGBcolor &color ). Triangle::getColor did not return correct color." << std::endl;
236 }
237
238 if( !context_test.getPrimitiveTextureFile(UUID).empty() ){
239 error_count++;
240 std::cerr << "failed: Triangle without texture mapping returned true for texture map test." << std::endl;
241 }
242
243 //------- Copy Triangle --------//
244
245 UUID_cpy = context_test.copyPrimitive(UUID);
246
247 std::vector<vec3> vertices_cpy = context_test.getPrimitiveVertices(UUID_cpy);
248
249 if( vertices.at(0).x!=vertices_cpy.at(0).x || vertices.at(0).y!=vertices_cpy.at(0).y || vertices.at(0).z!=vertices_cpy.at(0).z ||
250 vertices.at(1).x!=vertices_cpy.at(1).x || vertices.at(1).y!=vertices_cpy.at(1).y || vertices.at(1).z!=vertices_cpy.at(1).z ||
251 vertices.at(2).x!=vertices_cpy.at(2).x || vertices.at(2).y!=vertices_cpy.at(2).y || vertices.at(2).z!=vertices_cpy.at(2).z ){
252 error_count++;
253 std::cerr << "failed: copied triangle did not return correct vertices." << std::endl;
254 }
255
256 //translate the copied patch
257 shift = make_vec3(5,4,3);
258 context_test.translatePrimitive(UUID_cpy,shift);
259
260 vertices_cpy = context_test.getPrimitiveVertices(UUID_cpy);
261
262 if( vertices.at(0).x!=(vertices_cpy.at(0).x-shift.x) || vertices.at(0).y!=(vertices_cpy.at(0).y-shift.y) || vertices.at(0).z!=(vertices_cpy.at(0).z-shift.z) ||
263 vertices.at(1).x!=(vertices_cpy.at(1).x-shift.x) || vertices.at(1).y!=(vertices_cpy.at(1).y-shift.y) || vertices.at(1).z!=(vertices_cpy.at(1).z-shift.z) ||
264 vertices.at(2).x!=(vertices_cpy.at(2).x-shift.x) || vertices.at(2).y!=(vertices_cpy.at(2).y-shift.y) || vertices.at(2).z!=(vertices_cpy.at(2).z-shift.z) ){
265 error_count++;
266 std::cerr << "failed: translated triangle did not return correct vertices." << std::endl;
267 }
268
269 //------- Delete Patch --------//
270
271 context_test.deletePrimitive(UUID);
272
273 if( context_test.doesPrimitiveExist(UUID) ){
274 error_count++;
275 std::cerr << "failed: deletePrimitive. Triangle not properly deleted." << std::endl;
276 }
277
278 UUID = UUID_cpy;
279
280 //------- Add a Box --------//
281
282 //vector<uint> addBox( const vec3& center, const vec2& size, const int3& subdiv );
283 center = make_vec3(1,2,3);
284 vec3 size3(3,2,1);
285 int3 subdiv(1,1,1);
286 objID = context_test.addBoxObject( center, size3, subdiv );
287 UUIDs = context_test.getObjectPointer(objID)->getPrimitiveUUIDs();
288
289 normal_r = context_test.getPrimitiveNormal(UUIDs.at(0));
290 rotation_r = make_SphericalCoord( 0.5f*float(M_PI)-asinf( normal_r.z ), atan2f(normal_r.x,normal_r.y) );
291
292 if( std::abs(rotation_r.zenith-0.f)>errtol || std::abs(rotation_r.azimuth-0.f)>errtol ){
293 error_count++;
294 std::cerr << "failed: addBox(). Face normals incorrect." << std::endl;
295 }
296
297 normal_r = context_test.getPrimitiveNormal( UUIDs.at(2));
298 rotation_r = make_SphericalCoord( 0.5f*float(M_PI)-asinf( normal_r.z ), atan2f(normal_r.x,normal_r.y) );
299
300 if( std::abs(rotation_r.zenith-0.f)>errtol || std::abs(rotation_r.azimuth-0.5f*float(M_PI))>errtol ){
301 error_count++;
302 std::cerr << "failed: addBox(). Face normals incorrect." << std::endl;
303 }
304
305 size_r = context_test.getPatchSize( UUIDs.at(0) );
306
307 if( std::abs(size_r.x-size3.x)>errtol || std::abs(size_r.y-size3.z)>errtol ){
308 error_count++;
309 std::cerr << "failed: addBox(). Face sizes incorrect." << std::endl;
310 }
311
312 size_r = context_test.getPatchSize( UUIDs.at(2) );
313
314 if( std::abs(size_r.x-size3.y)>errtol || std::abs(size_r.y-size3.z)>errtol ){
315 error_count++;
316 std::cerr << "failed: addBox(). Face sizes incorrect." << std::endl;
317 }
318
319 if( std::abs(context_test.getBoxObjectVolume(objID)-size3.x*size3.y*size3.z)>errtol ){
320 error_count++;
321 std::cerr << "failed: addBox(). Box volume incorrect." << std::endl;
322 }
323 //------- Add a Rotated Tile --------//
324
325 center = make_vec3(1,2,3);
326 size = make_vec2(3,2);
327 int2 subdiv2(3,3);
328 rotation = make_SphericalCoord( 0.25f*M_PI, 1.4f*M_PI );
329 objID = context_test.addTileObject(center, size, rotation, subdiv2);
330 UUIDs = context_test.getObjectPointer(objID)->getPrimitiveUUIDs();
331
332 for( uint UUIDp : UUIDs){
333
334 normal_r = context_test.getPrimitiveNormal(UUIDp);
335
336 rotation_r = cart2sphere(normal_r);
337
338 if( std::abs(rotation_r.zenith-rotation.zenith)>errtol || std::abs(rotation_r.azimuth-rotation.azimuth)>errtol ){
339 error_count++;
340 std::cerr << "failed: addTile(). Sub-patch normals incorrect." << std::endl;
341 break;
342 }
343
344 }
345
346 //------- Add a Textured Tile with Transparency (disk) --------//
347
348 center = make_vec3(1,2,3);
349 size = make_vec2(3,2);
350 subdiv2 = make_int2(5,5);
351 rotation = make_SphericalCoord( 0.1*M_PI, 2.4*M_PI );
352 objID = context_test.addTileObject( center, size, rotation, subdiv2, "lib/images/disk_texture.png" );
353 UUIDs = context_test.getObjectPointer(objID)->getPrimitiveUUIDs();
354
355 float At = 0;
356 for( uint UUIDp : UUIDs){
357
358 float area = context_test.getPrimitiveArea(UUIDp);
359
360 At+=area;
361
362 }
363
364 float area_exact = 0.25f*PI_F*size.x*size.y;
365
366 if( std::abs(At-area_exact)>0.005 ){
367 error_count++;
368 std::cerr << "failed: addTile(). Texture masked area is incorrect." << std::endl;
369 std::cout << At << " " << area_exact << std::endl;
370 }
371
372 //------- Primitive Bounding Box --------//
373
374 std::vector<uint> UUID_bbox;
375
376 UUID_bbox.push_back( context_test.addPatch( make_vec3(-1,0,0), make_vec2(0.5,0.5) ));
377 UUID_bbox.push_back( context_test.addPatch( make_vec3(1,0,0), make_vec2(0.5,0.5) ));
378
379 vec3 bboxmin_patch, bboxmax_patch;
380 context_test.getPrimitiveBoundingBox( UUID_bbox, bboxmin_patch, bboxmax_patch );
381
382 if( bboxmin_patch.x!=-1.25f || bboxmax_patch.x!=1.25 || bboxmin_patch.y!=-0.25f || bboxmax_patch.y!=0.25f || bboxmin_patch.z!=0.f || bboxmax_patch.z!=0.f ){
383 error_count++;
384 std::cerr << "failed: getPrimitiveBoundingBox(). Bounding box is incorrect." << std::endl;
385 }
386
387 //------- Primitive Transformations --------//
388
389 vec2 sz_0(0.5,3.f);
390 float A_0 = sz_0.x*sz_0.y;
391
392 float scale = 2.6f;
393
394 UUID = context_test.addPatch( make_vec3(0,0,0), sz_0 );
395 context_test.scalePrimitive( UUID, make_vec3(scale,scale,scale) );
396
397 float A_1 = context_test.getPrimitiveArea(UUID);
398
399 if( std::abs( A_1 - scale*scale*A_0 )>1e-5 ){
400 error_count ++;
401 std::cerr << "failed: Patch scaling - scaled area not correct." << std::endl;
402 }
403
404 //------- Primitive Data --------//
405
406 float data = 5;
407 context_test.setPrimitiveData( UUID,"some_data",HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT,1,&data);
408
409 if( !context_test.doesPrimitiveDataExist( UUID,"some_data") ){
410 error_count ++;
411 std::cerr << "failed: setPrimitiveData - data was added but was not actually created." << std::endl;
412 }
413
414 float data_return;
415 context_test.getPrimitiveData( UUID,"some_data", data_return);
416 if( data_return!=data ){
417 error_count ++;
418 std::cerr << "failed: set/getPrimitiveData (setting/getting through primitive). Get data did not match set data." << std::endl;
419 std::cout << data_return << std::endl;
420 }
421
422 context_test.setPrimitiveData(UUID,"some_data",HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT,1,&data);
423 context_test.getPrimitiveData(UUID,"some_data",data_return);
424 if( data_return!=data ){
425 error_count ++;
426 std::cerr << "failed: set/getPrimitiveData (setting/getting through Context). Get data did not match set data." << std::endl;
427 std::cout << data_return << std::endl;
428 }
429
430 std::vector<float> data_v{0,1,2,3,4};
431
432 context_test.setPrimitiveData( UUID,"some_data",HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT,5,&data_v[0] );
433
434 std::vector<float> data_return_v;
435 context_test.getPrimitiveData( UUID,"some_data", data_return_v);
436 for( uint i=0; i<5; i++ ){
437 if( data_return_v.at(i)!=data_v.at(i) ){
438 error_count ++;
439 std::cerr << "failed: set/getPrimitiveData (setting/getting through primitive). Get data did not match set data." << std::endl;
440 std::cout << data_return << std::endl;
441 break;
442 }
443 }
444
445 data = 10;
446 context_test.setPrimitiveData( UUID,"some_data_2",data);
447
448 if( !context_test.doesPrimitiveDataExist( UUID,"some_data_2") ){
449 error_count ++;
450 std::cerr << "failed: setPrimitiveData - data was added but was not actually created." << std::endl;
451 }
452
453 context_test.getPrimitiveData( UUID,"some_data_2", data_return);
454 if( data_return!=data ){
455 error_count ++;
456 std::cerr << "failed: set/getPrimitiveData (setting/getting scalar data). Get data did not match set data." << std::endl;
457 std::cout << data_return << std::endl;
458 }
459
460 //primitive data filters
461
462 std::vector<uint> UUIDs_multi, UUIDs_filter;
463 UUIDs_multi.push_back( context_test.addPatch() );
464 context_test.setPrimitiveData( UUIDs_multi.back(), "some_data_float", 4.f );
465 context_test.setPrimitiveData( UUIDs_multi.back(), "some_data_string", "cat" );
466 UUIDs_multi.push_back( context_test.addPatch() );
467 context_test.setPrimitiveData( UUIDs_multi.back(), "some_data_float", 3.f );
468 context_test.setPrimitiveData( UUIDs_multi.back(), "some_data_string", "cat" );
469 UUIDs_multi.push_back( context_test.addPatch() );
470 context_test.setPrimitiveData( UUIDs_multi.back(), "some_data_float", 2.f );
471 context_test.setPrimitiveData( UUIDs_multi.back(), "some_data_string", "dog" );
472 UUIDs_multi.push_back( context_test.addPatch() );
473 context_test.setPrimitiveData( UUIDs_multi.back(), "some_data_float", 1.f );
474 context_test.setPrimitiveData( UUIDs_multi.back(), "some_data_string", "dog" );
475
476 UUIDs_filter = context_test.filterPrimitivesByData( UUIDs_multi, "some_data_float", 2.f, "<=" );
477 if( UUIDs_filter.size()!=2 || std::find(UUIDs_filter.begin(),UUIDs_filter.end(),UUIDs_multi.at(2))==UUIDs_filter.end() || std::find(UUIDs_filter.begin(),UUIDs_filter.end(),UUIDs_multi.at(3))==UUIDs_filter.end() ){
478 error_count ++;
479 std::cerr << "failed: primitive data filter for floats was not correct." << std::endl;
480 }
481
482 UUIDs_filter = context_test.filterPrimitivesByData( UUIDs_multi, "some_data_string", "cat" );
483 if( UUIDs_filter.size()!=2 || std::find(UUIDs_filter.begin(),UUIDs_filter.end(),UUIDs_multi.at(0))==UUIDs_filter.end() || std::find(UUIDs_filter.begin(),UUIDs_filter.end(),UUIDs_multi.at(1))==UUIDs_filter.end() ){
484 error_count ++;
485 std::cerr << "failed: primitive data filter for strings was not correct." << std::endl;
486 }
487
488 //------- Textures --------- //
489
490 vec2 sizep = make_vec2(2,3);
491
492 const char* texture = "lib/images/disk_texture.png";
493
494 vec2 uv0(0,0);
495 vec2 uv1(1,0);
496 vec2 uv2(1,1);
497 vec2 uv3(0,1);
498
499 uint UUIDp = context_test.addPatch( make_vec3(2,3,4), sizep, make_SphericalCoord(0,0), texture, 0.5*(uv0+uv2), uv2-uv0 );
500
501 if( context_test.getPrimitiveTextureFile(UUIDp).empty() ){
502 error_count ++;
503 std::cerr << "failed: Texture-mapped patch was found not to have texture." << std::endl;
504 }
505
506 std::string texture2 = context_test.getPrimitiveTextureFile(UUIDp);
507
508 if( texture2!=texture ){
509 error_count ++;
510 std::cerr << "failed: textures - queried texture file does not match that provided when adding primitive." << std::endl;
511 }
512
513 float Ap = context_test.getPrimitiveArea(UUIDp);
514
515 if( std::abs(Ap-0.25f*float(M_PI)*sizep.x*sizep.y)/(0.25f*float(M_PI)*sizep.x*sizep.y)>0.01f ){
516 error_count ++;
517 std::cerr << "failed: Texture-masked patch does not have correct area." << std::endl;
518 }
519
520 std::vector<vec2> uv;
521 uv = context_test.getPrimitiveTextureUV(UUIDp);
522
523 if( uv.size()!=4 ){
524 error_count ++;
525 std::cerr << "failed: Texture (u,v) coordinates for patch should have length of 4." << std::endl;
526 }
527 if( uv.at(0).x!=uv0.x || uv.at(0).y!=uv0.y || uv.at(1).x!=uv1.x || uv.at(1).y!=uv1.y || uv.at(2).x!=uv2.x || uv.at(2).y!=uv2.y || uv.at(3).x!=uv3.x || uv.at(3).y!=uv3.y ){
528 error_count ++;
529 std::cerr << "failed: Queried texture (u,v) coordinates do not match that provided when adding primitive." << std::endl;
530 }
531
532 uv0 = make_vec2( 0.25, 0.25 );
533 uv1 = make_vec2( 0.75, 0.25 );
534 uv2 = make_vec2( 0.75, 0.75 );
535 uv3 = make_vec2( 0.25, 0.75 );
536
537 uint UUIDp2 = context_test.addPatch( make_vec3(2,3,4), sizep, make_SphericalCoord(0,0), texture, 0.5*(uv2+uv0), uv2-uv0 );
538
539 float area = context_test.getPrimitiveArea(UUIDp2);
540
541 if( std::abs(area-sizep.x*sizep.y)>0.001f ){
542 error_count ++;
543 std::cerr << "failed: Patch masked with (u,v) coordinates did not return correct area." << std::endl;
544 }
545
546 uv0 = make_vec2( 0, 0 );
547 uv1 = make_vec2( 1, 1 );
548 uv2 = make_vec2( 0, 1 );
549
550 uint UUIDp3 = context_test.addTriangle( make_vec3(2,3,4), make_vec3(2,3+sizep.y,4), make_vec3(2+sizep.x,3+sizep.y,4), texture, uv0, uv1, uv2 );
551
552 area = context_test.getPrimitiveArea(UUIDp3);
553
554 if( std::abs(area-0.5f*0.25f*float(M_PI)*sizep.x*sizep.y)>0.01f ){
555 error_count ++;
556 std::cerr << "failed: Triangle masked with (u,v) coordinates did not return correct area." << std::endl;
557 }
558
559 uint UUIDt2 = context_test.addTriangle( make_vec3(0,0,0), make_vec3(1,0,0), make_vec3(1,1,0), "lib/images/diamond_texture.png", make_vec2(0,0), make_vec2(1,0), make_vec2(1,1) );
560 float solid_fraction = context_test.getPrimitiveSolidFraction(UUIDt2);
561 if( fabs(solid_fraction-0.5f)>errtol ){
562 error_count ++;
563 std::cerr << "failed: Textured triangle solid fraction was not correct." << std::endl;
564 std::cout << solid_fraction << std::endl;
565 }
566
567 //------- Global Data --------//
568
569 float gdata = 5;
570 context_test.setGlobalData("some_data",HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT,1,&gdata);
571
572 if( !context_test.doesGlobalDataExist("some_data") ){
573 error_count ++;
574 std::cerr << "failed: setGlobalData - data was added but was not actually created." << std::endl;
575 }
576
577 float gdata_return;
578 context_test.getGlobalData("some_data", gdata_return);
579 if( gdata_return!=gdata ){
580 error_count ++;
581 std::cerr << "failed: set/getGlobalData (setting/getting through primitive). Get data did not match set data." << std::endl;
582 }
583
584 std::vector<float> gdata_v{0,1,2,3,4};
585
586 context_test.setGlobalData("some_data",HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT,5,&gdata_v[0] );
587
588 std::vector<float> gdata_return_v;
589 context_test.getGlobalData("some_data", gdata_return_v);
590 for( uint i=0; i<5; i++ ){
591 if( gdata_return_v.at(i)!=gdata_v.at(i) ){
592 error_count ++;
593 std::cerr << "failed: set/getGlobalData (setting/getting vector data). Get data did not match set data." << std::endl;
594 break;
595 }
596 }
597
598 gdata = 10;
599 context_test.setGlobalData("some_data_2",gdata);
600
601 if( !context_test.doesGlobalDataExist("some_data_2") ){
602 error_count ++;
603 std::cerr << "failed: setGlobalData - data was added but was not actually created." << std::endl;
604 }
605
606 context_test.getGlobalData("some_data_2", gdata_return);
607 if( gdata_return!=gdata ){
608 error_count ++;
609 std::cerr << "failed: set/getGlobalData (setting/getting scalar data). Get data did not match set data." << std::endl;
610 }
611
612 //------- Compound Object Data --------//
613
614 uint IDtile = context_test.addTileObject(make_vec3(0, 0, 0), make_vec2(3, 1),
615 make_SphericalCoord(0, 0), make_int2(3, 3));
616
617 float objdata = 5;
618 context_test.setObjectData( IDtile, "some_data", objdata);
619
620 if( !context_test.doesObjectDataExist( IDtile, "some_data") ){
621 error_count ++;
622 std::cerr << "failed: setObjectData - data was added but was not actually created." << std::endl;
623 }
624
625 float objdata_return;
626 context_test.getObjectPointer(IDtile)->getObjectData("some_data", objdata_return);
627 if( objdata_return!=objdata ){
628 error_count ++;
629 std::cerr << "failed: set/getObjectData (getting through object pointer). Get data did not match set data." << std::endl;
630 }
631
632 std::vector<float> objdata_v{0,1,2,3,4};
633
634 context_test.setObjectData(IDtile, "some_data",HELIOS_TYPE_FLOAT,5,&objdata_v[0] );
635
636 std::vector<float> objdata_return_v;
637 context_test.getObjectData(IDtile,"some_data", objdata_return_v);
638 for( uint i=0; i<5; i++ ){
639 if( objdata_return_v.at(i)!=objdata_v.at(i) ){
640 error_count ++;
641 std::cerr << "failed: set/getObjectData. Get data did not match set data." << std::endl;
642 break;
643 }
644 }
645
646 objdata = 10;
647 context_test.setObjectData(IDtile,"some_data_2",objdata);
648
649 if( !context_test.doesObjectDataExist(IDtile,"some_data_2") ){
650 error_count ++;
651 std::cerr << "failed: setObjectData - data was added but was not actually created." << std::endl;
652 }
653
654 context_test.getObjectData(IDtile, "some_data_2", objdata_return);
655 if( objdata_return!=objdata ){
656 error_count ++;
657 std::cerr << "failed: set/getObjectData (setting/getting scalar data). Get data did not match set data." << std::endl;
658 }
659
660 //------- Cone Object Transformations --------//
661
662 float cone_radius_0 = 0.5f;
663 float cone_radius_1 = 1.0f;
664 float cone_length = 2.0f;
665
666 helios::vec3 node0 = make_vec3(0,0,0);
667 helios::vec3 node1 = make_vec3(0,0,cone_length);
668
669 //create cone object
670 uint cone_1 = context_test.addConeObject( 50, node0, node1, cone_radius_0, cone_radius_1);
671
672 //translate to (1,1,1)
673 context_test.getConeObjectPointer(cone_1)->translate(make_vec3(1, 1, 1));
674
675 // get the updated node position
676 std::vector<helios::vec3> nodes_T = context_test.getConeObjectPointer(cone_1)->getNodeCoordinates();
677
678 if(nodes_T.at(0).x - 1.0f > errtol || nodes_T.at(0).y - 1.0f > errtol || nodes_T.at(0).z - 1.0f > errtol ||
679 nodes_T.at(1).x - 1.0f > errtol || nodes_T.at(1).y - 1.0f > errtol || nodes_T.at(1).z - 3.0f > errtol ){
680
681 error_count ++;
682 std::cerr << "failed: translate cone object. Node coordinates after translation not correct." << std::endl;
683 }
684
685 //rotate so that the cone is parallel with x axis
686 // define the desired tube axis
687 helios::vec3 x_axis = helios::make_vec3(1,0,0);
688 helios::vec3 z_axis = make_vec3(0,0,1);
689 //get the axis about which to rotate
690 vec3 ra = cross( z_axis, x_axis);
691 //get the angle to rotate
692 float dot = x_axis.x*z_axis.x + x_axis.y*z_axis.y + x_axis.z*z_axis.z;
693 float angle = acos_safe(dot);
694
695 // translate back to origin
696 context_test.getConeObjectPointer(cone_1)->translate(-1.f*nodes_T.at(0));
697 //rotate
698 context_test.getConeObjectPointer(cone_1)->rotate( angle, ra);
699 // translate back
700 context_test.getConeObjectPointer(cone_1)->translate(nodes_T.at(0));
701 //get the updated node positions
702 nodes_T = context_test.getConeObjectPointer(cone_1)->getNodeCoordinates();
703
704 if(nodes_T.at(0).x - 1.0f > errtol || nodes_T.at(0).y - 1.0f > errtol || nodes_T.at(0).z - 1.0f > errtol ||
705 nodes_T.at(1).x - 3.0f > errtol || nodes_T.at(1).y - 1.0f > errtol || nodes_T.at(1).z - 1.0f > errtol ){
706 error_count ++;
707 std::cerr << "failed: rotate cone object. Node coordinates after rotation not correct." << std::endl;
708 }
709
710
711 //scale the length of the cone to twice its original length
712 context_test.getConeObjectPointer(cone_1)->scaleLength(2.0);
713 //get the updated node positions
714 nodes_T = context_test.getConeObjectPointer(cone_1)->getNodeCoordinates();
715
716 if(nodes_T.at(0).x - 1.0 > errtol || nodes_T.at(0).y - 1.0 > errtol || nodes_T.at(0).z - 1.0 > errtol ||
717 nodes_T.at(1).x - 6.0 > errtol || nodes_T.at(1).y - 1.0 > errtol || nodes_T.at(1).z - 1.0 > errtol ){
718
719 error_count ++;
720 std::cerr << "failed: scaleLength cone object. Node coordinates after length scaling not correct." << std::endl;
721 }
722
723 //scale the girth of the cone to twice its original radii
724 context_test.getConeObjectPointer(cone_1)->scaleGirth(2.0);
725 //get the updated node positions
726 std::vector<float> radii_T = context_test.getConeObjectPointer(cone_1)->getNodeRadii();
727
728 if(radii_T.at(0) - cone_radius_0*2.0 > pow(10,-6) || radii_T.at(1) - cone_radius_1*2.0 > pow(10, -6) ){
729 error_count ++;
730 std::cerr << "failed: scaleGirth cone object. Node radii after girth scaling not correct." << std::endl;
731 }
732
733 //------- Cartesian/Spherical Coordinate Conversion --------//
734
735 SphericalCoord sph1 = make_SphericalCoord(1.f,0.25*M_PI,1.5*M_PI);
736 vec3 cart = sphere2cart(sph1);
737 SphericalCoord sph2 = cart2sphere(cart);
738
739 if( std::abs(sph1.radius-sph2.radius)>errtol || std::abs(sph1.elevation-sph2.elevation)>errtol || std::abs(sph1.zenith-sph2.zenith)>errtol || std::abs(sph1.azimuth-sph2.azimuth)>errtol ){
740 std::cerr << "failed: cart2sphere and sphere2cart are not inverses." << std::endl;
741 error_count++;
742 }
743
744 //------- Julian Day Conversion ---------//
745
746 int JulianDay = 10;
747 int year = 2000; //leap year
748
749 Date date = Julian2Calendar(JulianDay,year);
750 if( date.year!=year || date.month!=1 || date.day!=JulianDay ){
751 std::cerr << "failed: Julian2Calendar conversion #1 incorrect." << std::endl;
752 error_count++;
753 }
754
755 JulianDay = 230;
756 date = Julian2Calendar(JulianDay,year);
757 if( date.year!=year || date.month!=8 || date.day!=17 ){
758 std::cerr << "failed: Julian2Calendar conversion #2 incorrect." << std::endl;
759 error_count++;
760 }
761
762 year = 2001; //non-leap year
763 date = Julian2Calendar(JulianDay,year);
764 if( date.year!=year || date.month!=8 || date.day!=18 ){
765 std::cerr << "failed: Julian2Calendar conversion #3 incorrect." << std::endl;
766 error_count++;
767 }
768
769 //-------- Spline Interpolation -----------//
770
771 vec3 p_start(0,0,0);
772 vec3 t_start(3,0,0);
773
774 vec3 p_end(1,1.5,0.4);
775 vec3 t_end(0,1,0);
776
777 float u = 0.6;
778
779 vec3 xi = spline_interp3( u, p_start, t_start, p_end, t_end );
780
781 vec3 xi_ref( 0.9360, 0.8280, 0.2592 );
782
783 if( std::abs(xi.x-xi_ref.x)>errtol || std::abs(xi.y-xi_ref.y)>errtol || std::abs(xi.z-xi_ref.z)>errtol ){
784 std::cerr << "failed: cubic spline interpolation incorrect." << std::endl;
785 error_count++;
786 }
787
788 //-------- Timeseries -----------//
789
790 Context context_ts;
791
792 Date date_ts( 12, 3, 2010 );
793 context_ts.setDate( date_ts );
794
795 Time time_ts( 13, 15, 39 );
796 context_ts.setTime( time_ts );
797
798 float T0 = 302.3;
799 float T1 = 305.3;
800 Time time0_ts = time_ts;
801 Time time1_ts = make_Time( time_ts.hour, 49, 14 );
802
803 context_ts.addTimeseriesData( "timeseries", T0, date_ts, time0_ts );
804 context_ts.addTimeseriesData( "timeseries", T1, date_ts, time1_ts );
805
806 context_ts.setCurrentTimeseriesPoint( "timeseries", 0 );
807
808 if( context_ts.getTimeseriesLength( "timeseries" )!=2 ){
809 std::cerr << "failed. getTimeseriesLength() did not give correct length." << std::endl;
810 error_count++;
811 }
812
813 Date d = context_ts.queryTimeseriesDate( "timeseries", 0 );
814
815 if( d.year!=date_ts.year || d.month!=date_ts.month || d.day!=date_ts.day ){
816 std::cerr << "failed. Set/query timeseries date do not match." << std::endl;
817 error_count++;
818 }
819
820 d = context_ts.queryTimeseriesDate( "timeseries", 1 );
821
822 if( d.year!=date_ts.year || d.month!=date_ts.month || d.day!=date_ts.day ){
823 std::cerr << "failed. Set/query timeseries date do not match." << std::endl;
824 error_count++;
825 }
826
827 Time t = context_ts.queryTimeseriesTime( "timeseries", 0 );
828
829 if( t.hour!=time0_ts.hour || t.minute!=time0_ts.minute || t.second!=time0_ts.second ){
830 std::cerr << "failed. Set/query timeseries time do not match." << std::endl;
831 error_count++;
832 }
833
834 t = context_ts.queryTimeseriesTime( "timeseries", 1 );
835
836 if( t.hour!=time1_ts.hour || t.minute!=time1_ts.minute || t.second!=time1_ts.second ){
837 std::cerr << "failed. Set/query timeseries time do not match." << std::endl;
838 error_count++;
839 }
840
841 float T_ts = context_ts.queryTimeseriesData( "timeseries", 0 );
842
843 if( T_ts!=T0 ){
844 std::cerr << "failed: Timeseries set/query data #0 do not match." << std::endl;
845 error_count++;
846 }
847
848 T_ts = context_ts.queryTimeseriesData( "timeseries", 1 );
849
850 if( T_ts!=T1 ){
851 std::cerr << "failed: Timeseries set/query data #1 do not match." << std::endl;
852 error_count++;
853 }
854
855 T_ts = context_ts.queryTimeseriesData( "timeseries", date_ts, time0_ts );
856
857 if( T_ts!=T0 ){
858 std::cerr << "failed: Timeseries set/query data #0 do not match." << std::endl;
859 error_count++;
860 }
861
862 T_ts = context_ts.queryTimeseriesData( "timeseries", date_ts, time1_ts );
863
864 if( T_ts!=T1 ){
865 std::cerr << "failed: Timeseries set/query data #1 do not match." << std::endl;
866 error_count++;
867 }
868
869 //context_ts.queryTimeseriesData( "timeseries", date_ts, make_Time(0,0,0) ); //this is to test that querying outside of dataset does not throw a segmentation fault.
870
871 context_ts.queryTimeseriesData( "timeseries", date_ts, make_Time(time0_ts.hour,time0_ts.minute,time0_ts.second+10) );
872
873 Context context_ts2;
874
875 context_ts2.loadTabularTimeseriesData("lib/testdata/weather_data.csv", {"date", "hour", "temperature"}, ",", "MMDDYYYY", 1);
876
877 Date date_ts2 = make_Date( 2, 1, 2020 );
878 Time time_ts2 = make_Time( 13, 00, 00 );
879 float T = context_ts2.queryTimeseriesData( "temperature", date_ts2, time_ts2 );
880
881 if( T != 35.32343f ){
882 std::cerr << "failed: Load of tabular weather data failed." << std::endl;
883 error_count++;
884 }
885
886 context_ts2.loadTabularTimeseriesData("lib/testdata/cimis.csv", {"cimis"}, "," );
887
888 date_ts2 = make_Date( 18, 7, 2023 );
889 time_ts2 = make_Time( 13, 00, 00 );
890 float rh = context_ts2.queryTimeseriesData( "air_humidity", date_ts2, time_ts2 );
891
892 if( rh != 0.42f ){
893 std::cerr << "failed: Load of CIMIS weather data failed." << std::endl;
894 error_count++;
895 }
896
897 //------- XML I/O --------//
898
899 Context context_io;
900
901 RGBcolor color_io = RGB::red;
902
903 //date/time
904
905 Date date_io( 12, 3, 2010 );
906 context_io.setDate( date_io );
907
908 Time time_io( 13, 15, 0 );
909 context_io.setTime( time_io );
910
911 //patch
912
913 vec3 p_io(2,3,5);
914 vec2 size_io(3,2);
915 SphericalCoord rot_io(1,0.3*M_PI,0.4*M_PI);
916
917 uint UUIDp_io = context_io.addPatch( p_io, size_io, rot_io, color_io );
918
919 int pdatai_p = 4;
920 float pdataf_p = 7.2;
921 context_io.setPrimitiveData( UUIDp_io, "pdatai", pdatai_p );
922 context_io.setPrimitiveData( UUIDp_io, "pdataf", pdataf_p );
923
924 //triangle
925
926 vec3 v0_io(2,3,5);
927 vec3 v1_io(5,1,2);
928 vec3 v2_io(8,4,6);
929
930 uint UUIDt_io = context_io.addTriangle( v0_io, v1_io, v2_io, color_io );
931
932 int pdatai_t = 9;
933 float pdataf_t = 2.7;
934 context_io.setPrimitiveData( UUIDt_io, "pdatai", pdatai_t );
935 context_io.setPrimitiveData( UUIDt_io, "pdataf", pdataf_t );
936
937 //global data
938
939 std::vector<double> gdatad_io{9.432, 2939.9292 };
940
941 context_io.setGlobalData( "gdatad", HELIOS_TYPE_DOUBLE, gdatad_io.size(), &gdatad_io[0] );
942
943 //timeseries
944
945 float T0_io = 302.3;
946 float T1_io = 305.3;
947 Time time0_io = time_io;
948 Time time1_io = make_Time( time_io.hour, 30, 0 );
949
950 context_io.addTimeseriesData( "ts_io", T0_io, date_io, time0_io );
951 context_io.addTimeseriesData( "ts_io", T1_io, date_io, time1_io );
952
953 context_io.addTileObject(p_io,size_io,nullrotation,make_int2(3,2),"lib/images/disk_texture.png");
954 context_io.addSphereObject( 8, p_io, 5 );
955 context_io.addDiskObject( 8, p_io, size_io );
956 context_io.addConeObject( 8, make_vec3(1,1,3), make_vec3(1,1,5), 3, 3 );
957 context_io.addBoxObject( p_io, make_vec3(3,2,1), make_int3(3,3,3), RGB::red );
958 context_io.addTubeObject( 8, {make_vec3(1,1,3), make_vec3(1,1,5)}, {3, 3} );
959
960 context_io.writeXML( "xmltest_io.xml", true );
961
962 Context context_oi;
963
964 context_oi.loadXML( "xmltest_io.xml", true );
965
966 // This now fails with Context::primitives being an unordered map because we can't assume the UUIDs transfer from the XML file
967 // float pdataf;
968 // int pdatai;
969 //
970 // context_oi.getPrimitiveData(0,"pdataf",pdataf);
971 // context_oi.getPrimitiveData(0,"pdatai",pdatai);
972 //
973 // if( pdataf!=pdataf_p || pdatai!=pdatai_p ){
974 // std::cerr << "failed. Patch primitive data write/read do not match." << std::endl;
975 // error_count ++;
976 // }
977
978 std::vector<double> gdatad;
979 context_oi.getGlobalData("gdatad",gdatad);
980
981 bool failio = false;
982 if( gdatad_io.size() != gdatad.size() ){
983 failio = true;
984 }
985 for( int i=0; i<gdatad_io.size(); i++ ){
986 if( fabs(gdatad.at(i)-gdatad_io.at(i))>1e-3 ){
987 failio = true;
988 }
989 }
990 if( failio ){
991 std::cerr << "failed. Global data write/read do not match." << std::endl;
992 error_count ++;
993 }
994
995 //------- setTileObjectSubdivisionCount, getTileObjectAreaRatio, cropDomain & writeXML & loadXML for compound objects --------//
996
997 Context context_to;
998
999 //non-textured tile object single subpatch
1000 uint to1 = context_to.addTileObject(make_vec3(0,0,0), make_vec2(1,0.3), make_SphericalCoord(float(M_PI)*0.25, float(M_PI)*0.75), make_int2(1,1));
1001 //non-textured tile object multiple subpatches
1002 uint to2 = context_to.addTileObject(make_vec3(1,1,1), make_vec2(1,1), make_SphericalCoord(float(M_PI)*0.25, float(M_PI)*0.75), make_int2(5,3));
1003 //textured tile object single subpatch disk
1004 uint to3 = context_to.addTileObject(make_vec3(2,2,2), make_vec2(1,0.3), make_SphericalCoord(float(M_PI)*0.25, float(M_PI)*0.75), make_int2(1,1), "lib/images/disk_texture.png");
1005 //textured tile object multiple subpatches disk
1006 uint to4 = context_to.addTileObject(make_vec3(3,3,3), make_vec2(1,0.3), make_SphericalCoord(float(M_PI)*0.25, float(M_PI)*0.75), make_int2(5,3), "lib/images/disk_texture.png");
1007 //textured tile object single subpatch diamond
1008 uint to5 = context_to.addTileObject(make_vec3(-1,-1,-1), make_vec2(1,1), make_SphericalCoord(M_PI*0.25, M_PI*0.75), make_int2(1,1), "lib/images/diamond_texture.png");
1009 //textured tile object multiple subpatches diamond
1010 uint to6 = context_to.addTileObject(make_vec3(-2,-2,-2), make_vec2(1,1), make_SphericalCoord(M_PI*0.25, M_PI*0.75), make_int2(5,3), "lib/images/diamond_texture.png");
1011
1012 //throw in a sphere object just to check error checks
1013// uint so1 = context_to.addSphereObject(10, make_vec3(4,4,4), 0.3);
1014// uint n_UUIDs_so1 = context_to.getObjectPointer(so1)->getPrimitiveUUIDs().size();
1015
1016 context_to.writeXML("xmltest_to.xml", true );
1017 uint context_to_PrimitiveCount = context_to.getPrimitiveCount();
1018 uint context_to_ObjectCount = context_to.getObjectCount();
1019
1020 //------------ getTileObjectAreaRatio -------------//
1021
1022 errtol = 1e-2;
1023 double err_1 = fabs(context_to.getTileObjectAreaRatio(to1) - 1.0);
1024 if(err_1 >= errtol){
1025 std::cerr << "failed. tile object area ratio returned by getTileObjectAreaRatio is not correct for non-textured single subpatch tile." << std::endl;
1026 error_count ++;
1027 }
1028 double err_2 = fabs(context_to.getTileObjectAreaRatio(to2) - 15.0);
1029 if(err_2 >= errtol){
1030 std::cerr << "failed. tile object area ratio returned by getTileObjectAreaRatio is not correct for non-textured multi-subpatch tile." << std::endl;
1031 error_count ++;
1032 }
1033 double err_3 = fabs(context_to.getTileObjectAreaRatio(to5) - 1.0);
1034 if(err_3 >= errtol){
1035 std::cerr << "failed. tile object area ratio returned by getTileObjectAreaRatio is not correct for textured single subpatch tile." << std::endl;
1036 error_count ++;
1037 }
1038 double err_4 = fabs(context_to.getTileObjectAreaRatio(to6) - 1.0*0.5/(1.0/15.0));
1039 if(err_4 >= 5.f*errtol){
1040 std::cerr << "failed. tile object area ratio returned by getTileObjectAreaRatio is not correct for textured multi-subpatch tile." << std::endl;
1041 error_count ++;
1042 }
1043
1044 //----------- setTileObjectSubdivisionCount -------------//
1045
1046 std::vector<uint> allObjectIDs_to = context_to.getAllObjectIDs();
1047 context_to.setTileObjectSubdivisionCount(allObjectIDs_to, make_int2(5,5));
1048 std::vector<uint> allObjectIDs_to_after = context_to.getAllObjectIDs();
1049 std::vector<uint> allUUIDs_to_after = context_to.getAllUUIDs();
1050
1051// if( (allUUIDs_to_after.size() - n_UUIDs_so1) != uint(150)){
1052// std::cerr << "failed. setTileObjectSubdivisionCount (subiv version) not producing the correct number of primitives." << std::endl;
1053// error_count ++;
1054// }
1055
1056 if( allObjectIDs_to_after.size() != allObjectIDs_to.size()){
1057 std::cerr << "failed. setTileObjectSubdivisionCount(subiv version) is changing the number of objects in the context (it shouldn't)." << std::endl;
1058 error_count ++;
1059 }
1060
1061 context_to.setTileObjectSubdivisionCount(allObjectIDs_to, 49);
1062 std::vector<uint> allObjectIDs_to_after2 = context_to.getAllObjectIDs();
1063 std::vector<uint> allUUIDs_to_after2 = context_to.getAllUUIDs();
1064
1065 if( allObjectIDs_to_after2 != allObjectIDs_to){
1066 std::cerr << "failed. setTileObjectSubdivisionCount (area ratio version) is changing the number of objects in the context (it shouldn't)." << std::endl;
1067 error_count ++;
1068 }
1069
1070 if( context_to.getTileObjectPointer(to1)->getPrimitiveUUIDs().size() == uint(49)){
1071 std::cerr << "failed. setTileObjectSubdivisionCount (area ratio version) did not result in the correct number of subpatches" << std::endl;
1072 error_count ++;
1073 }
1074
1075 //------------ writeXML & loadXML for compound objects --------------//
1076
1077 Context context_to2;
1078 context_to2.loadXML("xmltest_to.xml", true );
1079 uint context_to2_PrimitiveCount = context_to2.getPrimitiveCount();
1080 uint context_to2_ObjectCount = context_to2.getObjectCount();
1081
1082 if( context_to_PrimitiveCount != context_to2_PrimitiveCount){
1083 std::cerr << "failed. number of primitives before writing and loading xml does not match number after" << std::endl;
1084 error_count ++;
1085 }
1086
1087 if( context_to_ObjectCount != context_to2_ObjectCount){
1088 std::cerr << "failed. number of Objects before writing and loading xml does not match number after" << std::endl;
1089 error_count ++;
1090 }
1091
1092
1093 //------- deletion of objects when all constituent primitives are deleted --------//
1094
1095 // CASE # 1 Changing Object ID of one object primitive
1096 // Would expect a single object to remain containing one primitive and a separate non-object primitive
1097
1098 Context context_dzpo;
1099 context_dzpo.addTileObject(make_vec3(0,0,0), make_vec2(1,1), nullrotation, make_int2(1,2));
1100
1101 //set primitive parent object ID to zero
1102 context_dzpo.setPrimitiveParentObjectID(0, uint(0));
1103
1104 std::vector<uint> opi = context_dzpo.getObjectPrimitiveUUIDs(1);
1105 if(opi.size() != 1)
1106 {
1107 std::cerr << "failed. Changing Object ID of one object primitive did not result in correct number of primitives in the object" << std::endl;
1108 error_count ++;
1109 }
1110 context_dzpo.writeXML("./dzpo_case1.xml", true );
1111
1112 Context context_dzpo_load;
1113 context_dzpo_load.loadXML("./dzpo_case1.xml", true);
1114 std::vector<uint> opi_load = context_dzpo_load.getObjectPrimitiveUUIDs(1);
1115 if(opi_load.size() != 1)
1116 {
1117 std::cerr << "failed. Changing Object ID of one object primitive and writing/loading did not result in correct number of primitives in the object (Case 1)" << std::endl;
1118 error_count ++;
1119 }
1120
1121 //CASE # 2 Changing Object ID of one object primitive and deleting it
1122 //Would expect a single object to remain containing one primitive
1123
1124 Context context_dzpo2;
1125 context_dzpo2.addTileObject(make_vec3(0,0,0), make_vec2(1,1), nullrotation, make_int2(1,2));
1126
1127 //set one primitive parent object ID to zero
1128 context_dzpo2.setPrimitiveParentObjectID(0, uint(0));
1129 // delete it
1130 context_dzpo2.deletePrimitive(0);
1131
1132 context_dzpo2.writeXML("./dzpo_case2.xml", true);
1133
1134 Context context_dzpo2_load;
1135 context_dzpo2_load.loadXML("./dzpo_case2.xml", true);
1136 uint opi_load2 = context_dzpo2_load.getObjectPrimitiveUUIDs(1).size();
1137 uint n_prim2 = context_dzpo2_load.getAllUUIDs().size();
1138 uint n_obj2 = context_dzpo2_load.getAllObjectIDs().size();
1139
1140 if(opi_load2 != 1 | n_prim2 != 1 | n_obj2 != 1)
1141 {
1142 std::cerr << "failed. Changing Object ID of one object primitive, deleting, and writing/loading did not result in correct number of primitives or objects (Case 2)" << std::endl;
1143 error_count ++;
1144 }
1145
1146
1147 //CASE #3 Changing Object ID of one object primitive and deleting the other object primitive
1148 //Would expect the object to be deleted since it has no primitives
1149 Context context_dzpo3;
1150 context_dzpo3.addTileObject(make_vec3(0,0,0), make_vec2(1,1), nullrotation, make_int2(1,2));
1151
1152 //set one primitive parent object ID to zero
1153 context_dzpo3.setPrimitiveParentObjectID(0, uint(0));
1154 //delete the other (only) primitive that is part of the object
1155 context_dzpo3.deletePrimitive(1);
1156
1157 context_dzpo3.writeXML("./dzpo_case3.xml", true);
1158
1159 Context context_dzpo3_load;
1160 context_dzpo3_load.loadXML("./dzpo_case3.xml", true);
1161 uint n_prim3 = context_dzpo3_load.getAllUUIDs().size();
1162 uint n_obj3 = context_dzpo3_load.getAllObjectIDs().size();
1163
1164 if(n_prim3 != 1 | n_obj3 != 0)
1165 {
1166 std::cerr << "failed. Changing Object ID of one object primitive, deleting, and writing/loading did not result in correct number of primitives or objects (Case 3)" << std::endl;
1167 error_count ++;
1168 }
1169
1170 //---------- file name/path parsing functions -------------//
1171
1172 std::string filename = "/path/to/.hidden/file/filename";
1173
1174 std::string ext = getFileExtension(filename);
1175 std::string name = getFileName(filename);
1176 std::string stem = getFileStem(filename);
1177 std::string path = getFilePath(filename,true);
1178
1179 if( !ext.empty() || name!="filename" || stem!="filename" || path!="/path/to/.hidden/file/" ){
1180 std::cerr << "failed: file path parsing functions were not correct." << std::endl;
1181 error_count++;
1182 }
1183
1184 filename = ".hidden/path/to/file/filename.ext";
1185
1186 ext = getFileExtension(filename);
1187 name = getFileName(filename);
1188 stem = getFileStem(filename);
1189 path = getFilePath(filename,false);
1190
1191 if( ext!=".ext" || name!="filename.ext" || stem!="filename" || path!=".hidden/path/to/file" ){
1192 std::cerr << "failed: file path parsing functions were not correct." << std::endl;
1193 error_count++;
1194 }
1195
1196 //---------- primitive data calculation functions -------------//
1197
1198 std::vector<uint> UUIDs_calcfuns;
1199
1200 for( uint i=0; i<5; i++ ){
1201 UUIDs_calcfuns.push_back(context_test.addPatch());
1202 context_test.setPrimitiveData(UUIDs_calcfuns.back(),"data_calcfuns",float(i+1));
1203 }
1204
1205 float mean_calcfuns;
1206 context_test.calculatePrimitiveDataMean( UUIDs_calcfuns, "data_calcfuns", mean_calcfuns );
1207
1208 if( mean_calcfuns!=3.f ){
1209 std::cerr << "failed: calculatePrimitiveDataMean() did not produce correct mean value." << std::endl;
1210 error_count++;
1211 }
1212
1213 float awtmean_calcfuns;
1214 context_test.calculatePrimitiveDataAreaWeightedMean( UUIDs_calcfuns, "data_calcfuns", awtmean_calcfuns );
1215
1216 if( awtmean_calcfuns!=3.f ){
1217 std::cerr << "failed: calculatePrimitiveDataAreaWeightedMean() did not produce correct mean value." << std::endl;
1218 error_count++;
1219 }
1220
1221 float sum_calcfuns;
1222 context_test.calculatePrimitiveDataSum( UUIDs_calcfuns, "data_calcfuns", sum_calcfuns );
1223
1224 if( sum_calcfuns!=15.f ){
1225 std::cerr << "failed: calculatePrimitiveDataSum() did not produce correct sum value." << std::endl;
1226 error_count++;
1227 }
1228
1229 //------- OBJ File Read --------//
1230
1231 std::vector<uint> OBJ_UUIDs = context_test.loadOBJ( "lib/models/obj_object_test.obj", make_vec3(0,0,0), 0, nullrotation, RGB::blue, true );
1232
1233 std::vector<uint> UUIDs_patch = context_test.filterPrimitivesByData( OBJ_UUIDs, "object_label", "patch" );
1234 std::vector<uint> UUIDs_tri = context_test.filterPrimitivesByData( OBJ_UUIDs, "object_label", "triangles" );
1235
1236 if( UUIDs_patch.size()!=2 || UUIDs_tri.size()!=2 ){
1237 std::cerr << "failed: loadOBJ() did not properly assign object groups to elements." << std::endl;
1238 error_count++;
1239 }else{
1240 RGBcolor patch_color_0 = context_test.getPrimitiveColor( UUIDs_patch.at(0) );
1241 RGBcolor patch_color_1 = context_test.getPrimitiveColor( UUIDs_patch.at(1) );
1242 RGBcolor triangle_color_0 = context_test.getPrimitiveColor( UUIDs_tri.at(0) );
1243 RGBcolor triangle_color_1 = context_test.getPrimitiveColor( UUIDs_tri.at(1) );
1244 if( patch_color_0!=RGB::red || patch_color_1!=RGB::red || triangle_color_0!=RGB::lime || triangle_color_1!=RGB::lime ){
1245 std::cerr << "failed: loadOBJ() did not properly assign object groups and/or materials to elements." << std::endl;
1246 error_count++;
1247 }
1248 }
1249
1250 {
1251 // Test Context::seedRandomGenerator(uint)
1252 Context context_test;
1253 context_test.seedRandomGenerator(42);
1254 std::minstd_rand0* rng1 = context_test.getRandomGenerator();
1255 context_test.seedRandomGenerator(42);
1256 std::minstd_rand0* rng2 = context_test.getRandomGenerator();
1257
1258 if (rng1 == nullptr || rng2 == nullptr) {
1259 error_count++;
1260 std::cerr << "failed: Context::seedRandomGenerator. Random generator returned null pointer." << std::endl;
1261 }
1262 }
1263
1264 {
1265 // Test Context::getRandomGenerator()
1266 Context context_test;
1267 if (context_test.getRandomGenerator() == nullptr) {
1268 error_count++;
1269 std::cerr << "failed: Context::getRandomGenerator. Did not return a valid pointer." << std::endl;
1270 }
1271 }
1272
1273 {
1274 // Test Texture::getTextureFile() const
1275 const char* textureFilename = "lib/images/disk_texture.png";
1276 Texture texture(textureFilename);
1277 std::string textureFile = texture.getTextureFile();
1278
1279 if (textureFile != textureFilename) {
1280 error_count++;
1281 std::cerr << "failed: Texture::getTextureFile. Expected 'Almondleaf.png' but got '" << textureFile << "'." << std::endl;
1282 }
1283 }
1284
1285 {
1286 // Test Context::markGeometryClean()
1287 Context context_test;
1288 context_test.addPatch();
1289 context_test.markGeometryDirty();
1290 context_test.markGeometryClean();
1291
1292 if (context_test.isGeometryDirty()) {
1293 error_count++;
1294 std::cerr << "failed: Context::markGeometryClean. Geometry should be marked clean but is dirty." << std::endl;
1295 }
1296 }
1297
1298 {
1299 // Test Context::isGeometryDirty() const
1300 Context context_test;
1301 context_test.addPatch();
1302 context_test.markGeometryDirty();
1303
1304 if (!context_test.isGeometryDirty()) {
1305 error_count++;
1306 std::cerr << "failed: Context::isGeometryDirty. Expected geometry to be dirty but it is clean." << std::endl;
1307 }
1308 }
1309
1310
1311 {
1312 // Test Voxel::getArea() const
1313 float errtol = 1e-7;
1314 Context context_test;
1315 uint UUID = context_test.addVoxel(make_vec3(0, 0, 0), make_vec3(1, 1, 1)); // Corrected function call
1316
1317 if (!context_test.doesPrimitiveExist(UUID)) {
1318 error_count++;
1319 std::cerr << "failed: Voxel creation failed. Could not retrieve Voxel object." << std::endl;
1320 } else {
1321 float expected_area = 6.f; // Assuming a unit cube with six faces of area 1 each
1322 float area = context_test.getPrimitiveArea(UUID);
1323
1324 if (std::abs(area - expected_area) > errtol) {
1325 error_count++;
1326 std::cerr << "failed: Voxel::getArea. Expected " << expected_area << " but got " << area << "." << std::endl;
1327 }
1328 }
1329 }
1330
1331// ====== TEST Voxel::getNormal() ======
1332 {
1333 Context context_test; // Create a new Context instance
1334
1335 // Add a Voxel primitive and retrieve its UUID
1336 uint UUID = context_test.addVoxel(make_vec3(0, 0, 0), make_vec3(1, 1, 1));
1337
1338 if (!context_test.doesPrimitiveExist(UUID)) {
1339 error_count++;
1340 std::cerr << "failed: Voxel::getNormal() - Voxel creation failed." << std::endl;
1341 } else {
1342 // Get the normal of the created voxel
1343 vec3 normal = context_test.getPrimitiveNormal(UUID);
1344
1345 // Check if the normal is the expected value
1346 if (!(normal.x == 0.0f && normal.y == 0.0f && normal.z == 0.0f)) {
1347 error_count++;
1348 std::cerr << "failed: Voxel::getNormal() did not return expected (0,0,0)." << std::endl;
1349 }
1350 }
1351 }
1352
1353 {
1354 // Test Voxel::getVertices() const
1355 Context context_test;
1356 uint UUID = context_test.addVoxel(make_vec3(0, 0, 0), make_vec3(1, 1, 1));
1357
1358 if (!context_test.doesPrimitiveExist(UUID)) {
1359 error_count++;
1360 std::cerr << "failed: Voxel creation failed. Could not retrieve Voxel object." << std::endl;
1361 } else {
1362 std::vector<vec3> vertices = context_test.getPrimitiveVertices(UUID);
1363
1364 if (vertices.size() != 8) {
1365 error_count++;
1366 std::cerr << "failed: Voxel::getVertices. Expected 8 vertices but got " << vertices.size() << "." << std::endl;
1367 }
1368 }
1369 }
1370
1371
1372 {
1373 // Test Primitive::getColorRGB() const
1374 Context context_test;
1375 uint UUID = context_test.addPatch(make_vec3(0, 0, 0), make_vec2(1, 1));
1376
1377 if (!context_test.doesPrimitiveExist(UUID)) {
1378 error_count++;
1379 std::cerr << "failed: Patch creation failed. Could not retrieve Patch object." << std::endl;
1380 } else {
1381 RGBcolor color = context_test.getPrimitiveColor(UUID);
1382
1383 if (color.r != 0.f || color.g != 0.f || color.b != 0.f) {
1384 error_count++;
1385 std::cerr << "failed: Patch::getColorRGB. Expected (0,0,0) but got ("
1386 << color.r << ", " << color.g << ", " << color.b << ")." << std::endl;
1387 }
1388 }
1389 }
1390
1391 { // Test Primitive::overrideTextureColor()
1392 Context context_test;
1393 uint UUID = context_test.addPatch(make_vec3(0, 0, 0), make_vec2(1, 1));
1394
1395 if (!context_test.doesPrimitiveExist(UUID)) {
1396 error_count++;
1397 std::cerr << "failed: overrideTextureColor() - Patch creation failed." << std::endl;
1398 } else {
1399 context_test.overridePrimitiveTextureColor(UUID);
1400 if (!context_test.isPrimitiveTextureColorOverridden(UUID)) {
1401 error_count++;
1402 std::cerr << "failed: overrideTextureColor() - Texture override flag was not set correctly." << std::endl;
1403 }
1404 }
1405 }
1406
1407 { // Test Primitive::useTextureColor()
1408 Context context_test;
1409 uint UUID = context_test.addPatch(make_vec3(0, 0, 0), make_vec2(1, 1));
1410
1411 if (!context_test.doesPrimitiveExist(UUID)) {
1412 error_count++;
1413 std::cerr << "failed: useTextureColor() - Patch creation failed." << std::endl;
1414 } else {
1415 context_test.overridePrimitiveTextureColor(UUID);
1416 context_test.usePrimitiveTextureColor(UUID);
1417 if (context_test.isPrimitiveTextureColorOverridden(UUID)) {
1418 error_count++;
1419 std::cerr << "failed: useTextureColor() - Texture override flag was not reset correctly." << std::endl;
1420 }
1421 }
1422 }
1423
1424 { // Test Voxel::calculateSolidFraction()
1425 Context context_test;
1426 uint UUID = context_test.addVoxel(make_vec3(0, 0, 0), make_vec3(1, 1, 1));
1427
1428 if (!context_test.doesPrimitiveExist(UUID)) {
1429 error_count++;
1430 std::cerr << "failed: Voxel::calculateSolidFraction() - Voxel creation failed." << std::endl;
1431 } else {
1432 float solidFraction = context_test.getPrimitiveSolidFraction(UUID);
1433 if (std::abs(solidFraction - 1.0f) > errtol) {
1434 error_count++;
1435 std::cerr << "failed: Voxel::calculateSolidFraction() - Expected solid fraction 1.0 but got "
1436 << solidFraction << "." << std::endl;
1437 }
1438 }
1439 }

1441 { // Test Triangle::setVertices()
1442 Context context_test;
1443 uint UUID = context_test.addTriangle(make_vec3(0, 0, 0), make_vec3(1, 0, 0), make_vec3(0, 1, 0), RGB::red);
1444
1445 if (!context_test.doesPrimitiveExist(UUID)) {
1446 error_count++;
1447 std::cerr << "failed: Triangle::setVertices() - Triangle creation failed." << std::endl;
1448 } else {
1449 std::vector<vec3> vertices = context_test.getPrimitiveVertices(UUID);
1450 if (vertices.size() != 3) {
1451 error_count++;
1452 std::cerr << "failed: Triangle::setVertices() - Expected 3 vertices but got "
1453 << vertices.size() << "." << std::endl;
1454 }
1455 }
1456 }
1457
1458 { // Test Primitive::scale()
1459 Context context_test;
1460 uint UUID = context_test.addPatch(make_vec3(0, 0, 0), make_vec2(1, 1));
1461
1462 if (!context_test.doesPrimitiveExist(UUID)) {
1463 error_count++;
1464 std::cerr << "failed: Primitive::scale() - Patch creation failed." << std::endl;
1465 } else {
1466 context_test.scalePrimitive(UUID, make_vec3(2.0, 2.0, 2.0));
1467 float area = context_test.getPrimitiveArea(UUID);
1468 float expected_area = 4.0f;
1469 if (std::abs(area - expected_area) > errtol) {
1470 error_count++;
1471 std::cerr << "failed: Primitive::scale() - Expected area " << expected_area << " but got "
1472 << area << "." << std::endl;
1473 }
1474 }
1475 }
1476
1477 { // Test Patch::rotate()
1478 Context context_test;
1479 uint UUID = context_test.addPatch(make_vec3(0, 0, 0), make_vec2(1, 1));
1480
1481 if (!context_test.doesPrimitiveExist(UUID)) {
1482 error_count++;
1483 std::cerr << "failed: Patch::rotate() - Patch creation failed." << std::endl;
1484 } else {
1485 context_test.rotatePrimitive(UUID, M_PI / 4, make_vec3(0, 0, 1));
1486 vec3 normal = context_test.getPrimitiveNormal(UUID);
1487 if (std::abs(normal.x) > errtol || std::abs(normal.y) > errtol || std::abs(normal.z - 1.0) > errtol) {
1488 error_count++;
1489 std::cerr << "failed: Patch::rotate() - Normal did not rotate as expected." << std::endl;
1490 }
1491 }
1492 }
1493
1494 { // Test Triangle::rotate()
1495 Context context_test;
1496 uint UUID = context_test.addTriangle(make_vec3(0, 0, 0), make_vec3(1, 0, 0), make_vec3(0, 1, 0), RGB::blue);
1497
1498 if (!context_test.doesPrimitiveExist(UUID)) {
1499 error_count++;
1500 std::cerr << "failed: Triangle::rotate() - Triangle creation failed." << std::endl;
1501 } else {
1502 context_test.rotatePrimitive(UUID, M_PI / 2, make_vec3(0, 0, 1));
1503 vec3 normal = context_test.getPrimitiveNormal(UUID);
1504 if (std::abs(normal.x) > errtol || std::abs(normal.y) > errtol || std::abs(normal.z - 1.0) > errtol) {
1505 error_count++;
1506 std::cerr << "failed: Triangle::rotate() - Rotation incorrect." << std::endl;
1507 }
1508 }
1509 }
1510
1511 { // Test Voxel::rotate()
1512 Context context_test;
1513 uint UUID = context_test.addVoxel(make_vec3(0, 0, 0), make_vec3(1, 1, 1));
1514
1515 if (!context_test.doesPrimitiveExist(UUID)) {
1516 error_count++;
1517 std::cerr << "failed: Voxel::rotate() - Voxel creation failed." << std::endl;
1518 } else {
1519 context_test.rotatePrimitive(UUID, M_PI / 2, "z");
1520 vec3 normal = context_test.getPrimitiveNormal(UUID);
1521 if (std::abs(normal.x) > errtol || std::abs(normal.y) > errtol || std::abs(normal.z) > errtol) {
1522 error_count++;
1523 std::cerr << "failed: Voxel::rotate() - Expected normal to change after rotation." << std::endl;
1524 }
1525 }
1526 }
1527
1528 { // Triangle::rotate(float, const vec3&, const vec3&)
1529 Context context_test;
1530 uint UUID = context_test.addTriangle(make_vec3(0, 0, 0), make_vec3(1, 0, 0), make_vec3(0, 1, 0), RGB::red);
1531
1532 if (!context_test.doesPrimitiveExist(UUID)) {
1533 error_count++;
1534 std::cerr << "failed: Triangle::rotate() - Triangle creation failed." << std::endl;
1535 } else {
1536 context_test.rotatePrimitive(UUID, M_PI / 4, make_vec3(1, 1, 0), make_vec3(0, 0, 1));
1537 vec3 normal = context_test.getPrimitiveNormal(UUID);
1538 if (std::abs(normal.x) > errtol || std::abs(normal.y) > errtol || std::abs(normal.z - 1.0) > errtol) {
1539 error_count++;
1540 std::cerr << "failed: Triangle::rotate() - Rotation incorrect." << std::endl;
1541 }
1542 }
1543 }
1544
1545 { // Voxel::rotate(float, const char*)
1546 Context context_test;
1547 uint UUID = context_test.addVoxel(make_vec3(0, 0, 0), make_vec3(1, 1, 1));
1548
1549 if (!context_test.doesPrimitiveExist(UUID)) {
1550 error_count++;
1551 std::cerr << "failed: Voxel::rotate() - Voxel creation failed." << std::endl;
1552 } else {
1553 context_test.rotatePrimitive(UUID, M_PI / 2, "z");
1554 vec3 normal = context_test.getPrimitiveNormal(UUID);
1555 if (std::abs(normal.x) > errtol || std::abs(normal.y) > errtol || std::abs(normal.z) > errtol) {
1556 error_count++;
1557 std::cerr << "failed: Voxel::rotate() - Expected normal to change after rotation." << std::endl;
1558 }
1559 }
1560 }
1561
1562 // Determine platform-specific null stream
1563 #ifdef _WIN32
1564 const char* null_device = "NUL";
1565 #else
1566 const char* null_device = "/dev/null";
1567 #endif
1568
1569 { // 21. Voxel::rotate(float, const vec3&) - Ensure rotation is ignored for unsupported axes
1570 Context context_test;
1571 uint UUID = context_test.addVoxel(make_vec3(0, 0, 0), make_vec3(1, 1, 1));
1572
1573 if (!context_test.doesPrimitiveExist(UUID)) {
1574 error_count++;
1575 std::cerr << "failed: Voxel::rotate() - Voxel creation failed." << std::endl;
1576 } else {
1577 vec3 original_normal = context_test.getPrimitiveNormal(UUID);
1578
1579 // Suppress warnings temporarily
1580 std::streambuf* old_cerr = std::cerr.rdbuf();
1581 std::ofstream null_stream(null_device);
1582 std::cerr.rdbuf(null_stream.rdbuf());
1583
1584 context_test.rotatePrimitive(UUID, M_PI / 4, make_vec3(0, 1, 0)); // Invalid axis
1585
1586 // Restore std::cerr
1587 std::cerr.rdbuf(old_cerr);
1588
1589 vec3 new_normal = context_test.getPrimitiveNormal(UUID);
1590
1591 if (new_normal != original_normal) {
1592 error_count++;
1593 std::cerr << "failed: Voxel::rotate() - Rotation was incorrectly applied despite being ignored." << std::endl;
1594 }
1595 }
1596 }
1597
1598 { // 22. Voxel::rotate(float, const vec3&, const vec3&) - Ensure rotation is ignored for unsupported axes
1599 Context context_test;
1600 uint UUID = context_test.addVoxel(make_vec3(0, 0, 0), make_vec3(1, 1, 1));
1601
1602 if (!context_test.doesPrimitiveExist(UUID)) {
1603 error_count++;
1604 std::cerr << "failed: Voxel::rotate() - Voxel creation failed." << std::endl;
1605 } else {
1606 vec3 original_normal = context_test.getPrimitiveNormal(UUID);
1607
1608 // Suppress warnings temporarily
1609 std::streambuf* old_cerr = std::cerr.rdbuf();
1610 std::ofstream null_stream(null_device);
1611 std::cerr.rdbuf(null_stream.rdbuf());
1612
1613 context_test.rotatePrimitive(UUID, M_PI / 4, make_vec3(1, 1, 1), make_vec3(1, 0, 0)); // Invalid axis
1614
1615 // Restore std::cerr
1616 std::cerr.rdbuf(old_cerr);
1617
1618 vec3 new_normal = context_test.getPrimitiveNormal(UUID);
1619
1620 if (new_normal != original_normal) {
1621 error_count++;
1622 std::cerr << "failed: Voxel::rotate() - Rotation was incorrectly applied when it should be ignored." << std::endl;
1623 }
1624 }
1625 }
1626
1627 { // Triangle Constructor Test - Fix addTriangle
1628 Context context_test;
1629 vec3 v0 = make_vec3(0, 0, 0);
1630 vec3 v1 = make_vec3(1, 0, 0);
1631 vec3 v2 = make_vec3(0, 1, 0);
1632 uint UUID = context_test.addTriangle(v0, v1, v2, RGB::blue); // Corrected call
1633
1634 if (!context_test.doesPrimitiveExist(UUID)) {
1635 error_count++;
1636 std::cerr << "failed: Triangle constructor - Could not create Triangle." << std::endl;
1637 }
1638 }
1639
1640 { // Triangle::getVertex(int)
1641 Context context_test;
1642 uint UUID = context_test.addTriangle(make_vec3(0, 0, 0), make_vec3(1, 0, 0), make_vec3(0, 1, 0), RGB::green);
1643
1644 if (!context_test.doesPrimitiveExist(UUID)) {
1645 error_count++;
1646 std::cerr << "failed: Triangle::getVertex() - Triangle creation failed." << std::endl;
1647 } else {
1648 vec3 vertex0 = context_test.getTriangleVertex(UUID, 0);
1649 vec3 expected_vertex0 = make_vec3(0, 0, 0);
1650 if (vertex0 != expected_vertex0) {
1651 error_count++;
1652 std::cerr << "failed: Triangle::getVertex() - Incorrect vertex 0." << std::endl;
1653 }
1654 }
1655 }
1656
1658
1659 {
1660 // Test Triangle::Triangle constructor
1661 Context context_test;
1662
1663 helios::vec3 v0 = make_vec3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
1664 helios::vec3 v1 = make_vec3(1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
1665 helios::vec3 v2 = make_vec3(0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f);
1666 const char* textureFile = "lib/images/disk_texture.png";
1667 std::vector<helios::vec2> uv = {make_vec2(0.0f, 0.0f), make_vec2(1.0f, 0.0f), make_vec2(0.0f, 1.0f)};
1668 float solidFraction = 1.0f;
1669 uint parentObjectID = 1;
1670 uint UUID = 42; // Arbitrary test UUID
1671
1672 Triangle testTriangle(v0, v1, v2, textureFile, uv, solidFraction, parentObjectID, UUID);
1673
1674 // Check if vertices are correctly set
1675 std::vector<helios::vec3> vertices = testTriangle.getVertices();
1676 if (vertices.size() != 3 ||
1677 vertices[0] != v0 || vertices[1] != v1 || vertices[2] != v2) {
1678 error_count++;
1679 std::cerr << "failed: Triangle::Triangle - vertices not set correctly." << std::endl;
1680 }
1681
1682 // Check if the texture file is correctly assigned
1683 if (testTriangle.getTextureFile() != std::string(textureFile)) {
1684 error_count++;
1685 std::cerr << "failed: Triangle::Triangle - texture file not set correctly." << std::endl;
1686 }
1687
1688 // Check if the UV coordinates are correctly assigned
1689 std::vector<helios::vec2> retrievedUV = testTriangle.getTextureUV();
1690 if (retrievedUV != uv) {
1691 error_count++;
1692 std::cerr << "failed: Triangle::Triangle - UV coordinates not set correctly." << std::endl;
1693 }
1694
1695
1696 // Check if parent object ID is correctly assigned
1697 if (testTriangle.getParentObjectID() != parentObjectID) {
1698 error_count++;
1699 std::cerr << "failed: Triangle::Triangle - parent object ID not set correctly." << std::endl;
1700 }
1701
1702 // Check if UUID is correctly assigned
1703 if (testTriangle.getUUID() != UUID) {
1704 error_count++;
1705 std::cerr << "failed: Triangle::Triangle - UUID not set correctly." << std::endl;
1706 }
1707 }
1708
1709
1710
1711 { // Triangle::getCenter()
1712 Context context_test;
1713 vec3 v0 = make_vec3(0, 0, 0);
1714 vec3 v1 = make_vec3(2, 0, 0);
1715 vec3 v2 = make_vec3(0, 2, 0);
1716 uint UUID = context_test.addTriangle(v0, v1, v2, RGB::yellow);
1717
1718 if (!context_test.doesPrimitiveExist(UUID)) {
1719 error_count++;
1720 std::cerr << "failed: Triangle::getCenter() - Triangle creation failed." << std::endl;
1721 } else {
1722 std::vector<vec3> vertices = context_test.getPrimitiveVertices(UUID);
1723 vec3 center = (vertices[0] + vertices[1] + vertices[2]) / 3.0f; // Compute center manually
1724 vec3 expected_center = make_vec3(2.0 / 3.0, 2.0 / 3.0, 0.0);
1725 if (std::abs(center.x - expected_center.x) > errtol || std::abs(center.y - expected_center.y) > errtol || std::abs(center.z - expected_center.z) > errtol) {
1726 error_count++;
1727 std::cerr << "failed: Triangle::getCenter() - Expected center (" << expected_center.x << ", " << expected_center.y << ", " << expected_center.z << ") but got ("
1728 << center.x << ", " << center.y << ", " << center.z << ")." << std::endl;
1729 }
1730 }
1731 }
1732
1733 {
1734 // Test Voxel::Voxel( const RGBAcolor& a_color, uint a_parent_objID, uint a_UUID )
1735 RGBAcolor color = make_RGBAcolor(0.1f, 0.2f, 0.3f, 1.0f);
1736 uint parentID = 1;
1737 uint UUID = 42;
1738 Voxel voxel(color, parentID, UUID);
1739
1740 if (voxel.getColorRGBA().r != color.r || voxel.getColorRGBA().g != color.g ||
1741 voxel.getColorRGBA().b != color.b || voxel.getColorRGBA().a != color.a) {
1742 error_count++;
1743 std::cerr << "failed: Voxel::Voxel() - Color not initialized correctly." << std::endl;
1744 }
1745
1746 if (voxel.getParentObjectID() != parentID) {
1747 error_count++;
1748 std::cerr << "failed: Voxel::Voxel() - Parent ID not initialized correctly." << std::endl;
1749 }
1750
1751 if (voxel.getUUID() != UUID) {
1752 error_count++;
1753 std::cerr << "failed: Voxel::Voxel() - UUID not initialized correctly." << std::endl;
1754 }
1755 }
1756

1760 {
1761 // Test Context::getMonthString() const
1762 Context context_test;
1763 context_test.setDate(32, 2025); // Assuming Julian day 32 is February 1
1764
1765 std::string month = context_test.getMonthString();
1766
1767 if (month != "FEB") {
1768 error_count++;
1769 std::cerr << "failed: Context::getMonthString() - Expected 'FEB' but got '"
1770 << month << "'." << std::endl;
1771 }
1772 }

1775 {
1776 // Test Context::getJulianDate() const
1777 Context context_test;
1778
1779 int test_day = 32; // Set to a safe value
1780 int test_year = 2025; // More recent year to avoid issues
1781
1782 context_test.setDate(test_day, test_year); // Ensure day is valid
1783
1784 int julian_date = context_test.getJulianDate();
1785
1786 if (julian_date != test_day) {
1787 error_count++;
1788 std::cerr << "failed: Context::getJulianDate() - Expected " << test_day << " but got "
1789 << julian_date << "." << std::endl;
1790 }
1791 }

1793 {
1794 // Test Context::randu()
1795 Context context_test;
1796 float rand_value = context_test.randu();
1797 if (rand_value < 0.f || rand_value > 1.f) {
1798 error_count++;
1799 std::cerr << "failed: Context::randu() returned value out of range [0,1]." << std::endl;
1800 }
1801 }
1802
1803 {
1804 // Test Context::randu(float minrange, float maxrange)
1805 Context context_test;
1806 float min_range = 10.0, max_range = 20.0;
1807 float rand_value = context_test.randu(min_range, max_range);
1808 if (rand_value < min_range || rand_value > max_range) {
1809 error_count++;
1810 std::cerr << "failed: Context::randu(min,max) returned value out of range." << std::endl;
1811 }
1812 }
1813
1814 {
1815 // Test Context::randu(int minrange, int maxrange)
1816 Context context_test;
1817 int min_range = 5, max_range = 15;
1818 int rand_value = context_test.randu(min_range, max_range);
1819 if (rand_value < min_range || rand_value > max_range) {
1820 error_count++;
1821 std::cerr << "failed: Context::randu(int min, int max) returned value out of range." << std::endl;
1822 }
1823 }
1824
1825 {
1826 // Test Context::randn()
1827 Context context_test;
1828 float rand_value = context_test.randn();
1829 if (rand_value < -5.f || rand_value > 5.f) { // Assuming 5-sigma rule
1830 error_count++;
1831 std::cerr << "failed: Context::randn() returned extreme value outside expected range." << std::endl;
1832 }
1833 }
1834
1835 {
1836 // Test Context::randn(float mean, float stddev)
1837 Context context_test;
1838 float mean = 100.0, stddev = 10.0;
1839 float rand_value = context_test.randn(mean, stddev);
1840 if (rand_value < mean - 5 * stddev || rand_value > mean + 5 * stddev) {
1841 error_count++;
1842 std::cerr << "failed: Context::randn(mean, stddev) returned value outside expected range." << std::endl;
1843 }
1844 }
1845
1846
1847 {
1848 // Test Voxel::getCenter() const
1849 Context context_test;
1850 vec3 center = make_vec3(1, 1, 1);
1851 uint UUID = context_test.addVoxel(center, make_vec3(1, 1, 1));
1852
1853 if (!context_test.doesPrimitiveExist(UUID)) {
1854 error_count++;
1855 std::cerr << "failed: Voxel::getCenter() - Voxel creation failed." << std::endl;
1856 } else {
1857 if (context_test.getPrimitiveType(UUID) != PRIMITIVE_TYPE_VOXEL) {
1858 error_count++;
1859 std::cerr << "failed: UUID does not correspond to a Voxel object." << std::endl;
1860 } else {
1861 vec3 retrieved_center = context_test.getVoxelCenter(UUID); // Use correct function
1862
1863 if (!(retrieved_center.x == center.x && retrieved_center.y == center.y && retrieved_center.z == center.z)) {
1864 error_count++;
1865 std::cerr << "failed: Voxel::getCenter() did not return expected center coordinates." << std::endl;
1866 }
1867 }
1868 }
1869 }
1870

1876
1877 if (!context_test.doesPrimitiveExist(UUID)) {
1878 error_count++;

1880 } else {

1882 error_count++;
1883 std::cerr << "failed: UUID does not correspond to a Voxel object." << std::endl;
1884 } else {
1885 vec3 retrieved_size = context_test.getVoxelSize(UUID); // Use correct function
1886
1887 if (!(retrieved_size.x == size.x && retrieved_size.y == size.y && retrieved_size.z == size.z)) {
1888 error_count++;

1900 int test_minute = 30;

1902

1904

1906 error_count++;
1907 std::cerr << "failed: Context::setTime() did not set the correct time." << std::endl;

1913 Context context_test;
1914 int test_day = 200;
1915 int test_year = 2024;
1916 context_test.setDate(test_day, test_year);
1917
1918 helios::Date retrieved_date = context_test.getDate(); // Ensure this function exists
1919
1920 // Assuming `Date` has `day`, `month`, or `year` instead of `julian_day`
1921 if (retrieved_date.day != 18 || retrieved_date.year != test_year) {
1922 error_count++;
1923 std::cerr << "failed: Context::setDate() did not set the correct date. Expected day "
1924 << test_day << " and year " << test_year << " but got "
1925 << retrieved_date.day << " and " << retrieved_date.year << "." << std::endl;
1926 }

1934 Location expected_location = make_Location(38.55, 121.76, 8);
1935
1936 Location retrieved_location = context_test.getLocation();
1937
1938 // Compare entire object rather than accessing nonexistent members
1939 if (!(retrieved_location == expected_location)) {
1940 error_count++;
1941 std::cerr << "failed: Context::getLocation() did not return the correct default location." << std::endl;
1942 }

1952 context_test.setLocation(location_test);
1953
1954 Location retrieved_location = context_test.getLocation();
1955
1956 // Assuming `make_Location()` correctly assigns values, compare using a helper function

1963 {
1964 // Test Context::addPatch( const vec3& center, const vec2& size, const SphericalCoord& rotation, const char* texture_file )
1965 Context context_test;
1966 vec3 center = make_vec3(0, 0, 0);
1967 vec2 size = make_vec2(1, 1);
1968 SphericalCoord rotation = make_SphericalCoord(0, 0, 0);
1969 const char* texture_file = "lib/images/disk_texture.png";
1970
1971 uint UUID = context_test.addPatch(center, size, rotation, texture_file);
1972
1973 if (!context_test.doesPrimitiveExist(UUID)) {
1974 error_count++;
1975 std::cerr << "failed: addPatch() - Patch creation failed." << std::endl;
1976 } else {
1977 if (context_test.getPrimitiveType(UUID) != PRIMITIVE_TYPE_PATCH) {
1978 error_count++;
1979 std::cerr << "failed: addPatch() - Primitive type mismatch." << std::endl;
1980 }
1981 if (context_test.getPrimitiveTextureFile(UUID) != texture_file) {
1982 error_count++;
1983 std::cerr << "failed: addPatch() - Texture file mismatch." << std::endl;
1984 }
1985 }
1986 }

2074 {
2075 // Test Context::rotatePrimitive(uint UUID, float rot, const char* axis )
2076 Context context_test;
2077 uint UUID = context_test.addVoxel(make_vec3(0, 0, 0), make_vec3(1, 1, 1));
2078
2079 float rotation = 90.0f;
2080 context_test.rotatePrimitive(UUID, rotation, "z");
2081
2082 // Verify that rotation was applied
2083 if (!context_test.isGeometryDirty()) {
2084 error_count++;
2085 std::cerr << "failed: rotatePrimitive() - Rotation not applied." << std::endl;
2086 }
2087 }
2088
2089 {
2090 // Test Context::rotatePrimitive(const std::vector<uint>& UUIDs, float rot, const char* axis)
2091 Context context_test;
2092 float rotation_angle = M_PI / 2.0; // 90 degrees
2093 const char* axis = "z";
2094
2095 uint UUID = context_test.addPatch(make_vec3(0, 0, 0), make_vec2(1, 1));
2096
2097 if (!context_test.doesPrimitiveExist(UUID)) {
2098 error_count++;
2099 std::cerr << "failed: rotatePrimitive() - Patch creation failed." << std::endl;
2100 } else {
2101 std::vector<uint> UUIDs = {UUID};
2102 context_test.rotatePrimitive(UUIDs, rotation_angle, axis);
2103
2104 vec3 new_normal = context_test.getPrimitiveNormal(UUID);
2105
2106 if (std::abs(new_normal.x - 0.0f) > 1e-5 || std::abs(new_normal.y - 0.0f) > 1e-5 || std::abs(new_normal.z - 1.0f) > 1e-5) {
2107 error_count++;
2108 std::cerr << "failed: rotatePrimitive() - Patch normal incorrect after rotation around Z-axis." << std::endl;
2109 }
2110 }
2111 }
2112
2113 {
2114 // Test Context::translatePrimitive(const std::vector<uint>& UUIDs, const vec3& shift)
2115 Context context_test;
2116 std::vector<uint> UUIDs;
2117
2118 // Add a patch
2119 UUIDs.push_back(context_test.addPatch(make_vec3(0, 0, 0), make_vec2(1, 1)));
2120
2121 if (!context_test.doesPrimitiveExist(UUIDs[0])) {
2122 error_count++;
2123 std::cerr << "failed: Patch creation failed. UUID does not exist." << std::endl;
2124 } else {
2125 vec3 shift = make_vec3(2.0f, 3.0f, 1.0f);
2126 context_test.translatePrimitive(UUIDs, shift);
2127
2128 // Retrieve the new position using getPatchCenter (valid for patches)
2129 vec3 newPosition = context_test.getPatchCenter(UUIDs[0]);
2130
2131 if (fabs(newPosition.x - 2.0f) > 1e-6 ||
2132 fabs(newPosition.y - 3.0f) > 1e-6 ||
2133 fabs(newPosition.z - 1.0f) > 1e-6) {
2134 error_count++;
2135 std::cerr << "failed: Context::translatePrimitive - Patch was not moved correctly." << std::endl;
2136 }
2137 }
2138 }
2139
2140
2141 {
2142 // Test Context::scalePrimitive(const std::vector<uint>& UUIDs, const helios::vec3& S)
2143 Context context_test;
2144 std::vector<uint> UUIDs;
2145 UUIDs.push_back(context_test.addPatch(make_vec3(0, 0, 0), make_vec2(1, 1)));
2146
2147 context_test.scalePrimitive(UUIDs, make_vec3(2, 2, 1));
2148
2149 vec2 newSize = context_test.getPatchSize(UUIDs[0]);
2150 if (newSize.x != 2.0f || newSize.y != 2.0f) {
2151 error_count++;
2152 std::cerr << "failed: Context::scalePrimitive - Scaling incorrect." << std::endl;
2153 }
2154 }

2164 if (newSize.x != 2.0f || newSize.y != 2.0f || newSize.z != 2.0f) {
2165 error_count++;

2184
2185 {
2186 // Test Context::doesPrimitiveExist(const std::vector<uint>& UUIDs) const
2187 Context context_test;
2188 std::vector<uint> UUIDs;
2189 UUIDs.push_back(context_test.addVoxel(make_vec3(0, 0, 0), make_vec3(1, 1, 1)));
2190
2191 if (!context_test.doesPrimitiveExist(UUIDs)) {
2192 error_count++;
2193 std::cerr << "failed: Context::doesPrimitiveExist - Primitive should exist but does not." << std::endl;
2194 }
2195
2196 context_test.deletePrimitive(UUIDs[0]);
2197
2198 if (context_test.doesPrimitiveExist(UUIDs)) {
2199 error_count++;
2200 std::cerr << "failed: Context::doesPrimitiveExist - Primitive should not exist but does." << std::endl;
2201 }
2202 }
